snippet.title: The Hexadome: Aristeia Showdown - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
The Hexadome: Aristeia Showdown is a 1v1 turn-based team tactics game. 

In the Hexadome, the arena where the action takes place, professional fighters battle each other in a TV Show designed to entertain the masses.

Pick your champions and fight in merciless 1v1 turn-based matches. Send your fighters in the arena, position them strategically, create synergies and give the crowd a brutal show! Unlock your ultimate attacks, influence the course of the game and dominate The Hexadome!

© 2023. All rights reserved. Developed by Blindspot Games.
Based on Corvus Belli's tabletop game Aristeia.

Wishlist on Steam:
https://bit.ly/TheHexadome-Steam 

Visit The Hexadome:
https://www.thehexadome.com 

Find us: 
Discord: https://discord.gg/GXDAr5jMuB
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheHexadome
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/the_hexadome/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheHexadome

Developed by Blindspot Games
https://www.blindspot-games.com
